column4: can some one help me with a broken package.. i'm not able to upgrade
sudo apt-get -f install
i did that ..but it didn't help
without a package name?
shall i paste the output some place
mono ... i was trying to get the latest build
use pastebin please see bots message
http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/32605/
updated the system ... how do i check whether i'm running dapper or edgy
lsb_release -a
did you reboot into the 2.6.17 kernel?
yes i rebooted and chose the first kernel in grub
dont remember the version
the command i gave you will tell you
it says dapper :(
than try gksudo "update-manager -c"
cool .. it says new distro is available
it should give you an option to upgrade distro if not hit check and it should
there you go :)
thanks
